document_data.name: Silver Turban Legion
document_data.base: [[Citadel of Ice and Steel]], [[Elemental Plane of Air]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Silver Turban Legion''', or the '''Feathers''', was a military organization operating out of the [[Citadel of Ice and Steel]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Air]].
document_data.Organization: 250 [[djinni]] riding [[griffon]]s comprised the Silver Turban Legion. Only females were permitted to join.
document_data.Activities: The Silver Turban Legion served as shock troops for the djinn.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Citadel of Ice and Steel within the Elemental Plane of Air served as base of all djinni military organizations.
